name: Counter-Strike 2
desc: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin. This is Counter-Strike 2.
Help Mox break out from his unjust inprisonment. Navigate through a hazardous, futuristic city and outrun your pursuer to reach an off-world colony in this 2D precision-platformer!
name: Unbound

desc: Begin your career at the Multiversal Institute for the Rhythmic Arts (MIRA), an interdimensional school where music, magic, and friendship collide.Â  Encore! is a rhythm game and visual novel hybrid, where you must curate a band from wacky characters to win Battle of the Bands!
name: Encore!

desc: Super-B is a free-to-play multiplayer game with AAA 3D graphics, where players become toy characters in a brick-built world. It features 12+ game modes at launch, offering fast-paced action and social interaction.
name: Super-B
Escape Game: Camper 2
desc: An escape game set inside a camper trailer. Search for items, gather clues, solve puzzles, and find your way out in this short, casual experience.

name: The Dead Roam Free - Episode 1
desc: Follow Bob Segatti â€” private eye, local fixer, and newly turned zombie â€” in his biggest case yet. A film-noir tale of treachery, revenge, and pixel-splattered mayhem. Itâ€™s Snake with guns, dames, and a whole lot of brains to eat.

name: Wuthering Waves
desc: Wuthering Waves is a story-rich open-world action RPG with a high degree of freedom. You wake from your slumber as Rover, joined by a vibrant cast of Resonators on a journey to reclaim your lost memories and change the world.

name: ç•°ãƒæ•…ãƒª-Isolated Hours-
desc: A 3D horror game where your only goal is to finish your workâ€¦ and survive the night. Unnatural anomalies creep into the office as you complete your tasks. Can you make it to the end of your shift alive.

name: REAL MOON
desc: Explore a precisely recreated lunar surface built from real data and a JAXA-backed simulation.

name: Where Winds Meet
desc: Where Winds Meet is an epic Wuxia open-world action-adventure RPG set in ancient China at the tenth century. Players will assume the role of a young sword master as they embark on a journey to uncover the mysteries of their own identity. Let the wind carry your legend on an epic journey to the East!

name: bygone snow
desc: When the world ends, who will you spend your final hours with? A visual novel for the GBA.

name: The Ice Cream Culprit
desc: Let your girlfriend know (or not) about the culprit who ate her ice cream.

name: Truck Company
desc: TruckCompany - is a strategic game in which you develop your transport enterprise, the aim of which is to create a great consortium with other players and compete with others for the title of the best businessmen

name: Letherfall
desc: Letherfall is a first-person horror video game with Lovecraftian elements: the player must make their way through monstrous entities and intricate puzzles while exploring the abandoned village of Letherfall. Some nightmares donâ€™t fade. Theyâ€™re just waiting for you to open the wrong door.

name: Dumbubu
desc: You will own nothing and be happy. You can't afford a house, but you can afford Dumbubu Desktop Pet. Interact with Dumbubu and receive random skins tradeable on Steam Market.

name: Dave's Wrecking Yard 3D
desc: It's the late 1990s all over again and you find yourself the owner of Dave's Wrecking Yard.Â Earn cash by filling various parts orders by phone, internet, & walk-in customers. Enjoy working at your own pace while ordering pizzas and chugging sodas.

name: Love Limit
desc: Your blind date invades Earth!?

notes: Only read the game and choose the ending.
name: Mobile Murder Mystery
desc: Follow the story of the Unseen Narrator, whose repetitive life falls apart when their co-worker decides to quit on a whim.

name: emerald
desc: what do you fear?

name: In Our Parlor
desc: In Our Parlor is a short, horror walking simulator. The player must make their way through a mysterious manor to unfold the story, find the parlor, and escape this nightmare. Navigate a series of dark set pieces and follow the music to discover the path forward.

name: Soulcrossed
desc: A visual novel with SRPG battles that will test both your mind and heart.

name: PoligonVR
desc: Imagine a virtual world where you can create or be anything you ever wanted. PoligonVR is a powerful community driven sandbox where we give you the necessary tools to turn your dreams into virtual reality.

name: Dota Underlords
desc: Hire a crew and destroy your rivals in this new strategy battler set in the world of Dota. Introducing Season One: Explore White Spire and earn rewards on the Battle Pass. Pick from several different game modes, play on your own or with friends, and take advantage of crossplay on PC and mobile.

name: Dota 2
desc: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.

name: Artifact
desc: Artifact now features two games: Artifact Classic, the original Dota 2 trading card game, and Artifact Foundry, a special edition with streamlined gameplay, new cards, new single-player content, and an improved new player experience.

name: Alien Swarm
desc: Co-operative multiplayer game and complete code base available for free.

name: Team Fortress 2
desc: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

name: Death Drive
desc: Death Drive is a road trip visual novel inspired by classic American Gothic fiction.

name: Shrouded Depths
desc: Stranded in the fog of the murky waters on an isolated ferry with nothing but your harpoon gun, you feel the overwhelming presence of something within the misty mangrove. Your vessel is stopped dead and it is up to you with the assistance of the Captain to get the boat back up and running again.

name: Welcome To The Dark Place
desc: The train is the only escape.

name: Sunday School
desc: You are trapped in a Sunday School, plagued by eerie childlike hallucinations. Observe your surroundings carefully to spot anomalies, and descend deeper only when youâ€™re certain itâ€™s safe.

name: Yukiã€Œæ¸…é†’æ¢¦ã€
desc: Explore an abandoned school where memories linger longer than the living. Uncover the mystery of your best friendâ€™s disappearance. Dodge bullets.

name: FOR GOD'S SAKE, HELP HIM!
desc: FOR GOD'S SAKE, HELP HIM! is a tiny, surreal first-person art "game" about what it's like. your goal is singular and simple: try to help him, however you can... if you can. that's a tall order considering you're both in a blank void and he's being crushed over and over.

name: Fear The Unknown - Dave Story
desc: This story is one of the rare accounts we've managed to document a tale from the few who have encountered UFOs and lived to tell the tale. Dave considers himself lucky, and maybe you will be too, if you dare to face the unknown and survive.

name: Aker Fern 2
desc: Take on the role of Dan Tern, a young man in whom the consciousness of MikoÅ‚aj Fernâ€”a man from five hundred years agoâ€”has awakened. Discover the mysteries of the past, confront the curse that haunts him, and conclude a story that never reached its end.

name: Goodbye
desc: A story-driven interactive game about a sweet old lady and a mysterious figure. Follow her daily routine by completing a simple task list, until itâ€™s time to make an unusual deal with the One Whoâ€™s Waiting. And please, do not say â€œgoodbye.â€

name: Headspace
desc: A NSFW Adventure-RPG where you either subdue or seduce the various denizens of your imagination, all while trying to remember who you are. Can you escape the confines of your Headspace?

name: The Night Is Long
desc: The Night Is Long is a short first-person horror game where a grieving man follows a ghostly vision into an abandoned mansion. Uncover dark secrets, survive atmospheric horrors, and face your past through exploration, puzzles, and subtle scares.

name: BIRDHOUSE
desc: A short narrative-driven horror game made in RPGmaker featuring hand-drawn graphics and animated cutscenes. Players navigate the house and its backyard, interacting with the environment and collecting key items to progress the story.

name: You And I
desc: "You And Iâ€ is an interactive film where you guide Mark, lost deep in the woods with his friend, Ace. However the more time the two spend together, the stranger the two become.

name: Yes, No, Goodbye
desc: Yes, No, Goodbye is a haunting word game where you play as an exorcist attempting to send off a spirit clinging to their old apartment. Unscramble the truth and seek out solace for the dead.

name: Road Trip to the End of the World
desc: Road Trip to the End of the World is a visual novel about the death of a friendship. When Andy and her imaginary friend Fishy set off on a road trip to crash their ex-best friendâ€™s wedding, will they know when to hit the brakes?
developer: Shark and Pelican Games, Alex M. Lee

name: The Wind and the Wisp
desc: A 3D adventure game about blowing into the microphone. Join the Wind, a non-corporeal petal breeze, and the Wisp, a little white ghost with a red ribbon, on their journey to repair a mysterious broken garden.

name: Stomach
desc: STOMACH is a first-person survival horror cooking game located in a cruise ship with PS1 inspired graphics to capture that retro horror feeling. Your task is to read a food order, search for food ingredients, and make it back safely to the kitchen to cook your ingredients before time runs out.

name: The Man in the Park 2: The Second Man in the Park
desc: It's been so long. You've tried to forget, however tonight you must walk through the park again. Now there are two men in the park. Will you help one, or both? Who will you trust?

name: Wanderness
desc: Capture stunning moments with your trusty camera and immerse yourself in a soothing, zen-inspired world that calms your mind and eases anxiety.

name: Kimochii Classroom
desc: Welcome to Kimochii Classroom! A slice-of-life visual novel with stunning visuals, a beautiful soundtrack, and an immersive story. Who will you meet first?

name: blank_01
desc: eat, sleep, work, repeat.

name: boyfriend or cake??
desc: alternatively: caring romantic partner or delicious confectionery dessert?

name: The Man in the Park
desc: You see a man in the park on your walk home. Will you help him?

name: BETWEEN
desc: "May you leave no regrets in this journey of life." ã€ An independent game about death. Explore the past lives in an atmospheric graveyard.

name: Beneath The Cherry Trees
desc: "There are bodies buried beneath the cherry trees!" A Japanese poetic literature "Beneath The Cherry Trees(1928)" by MotojirÅ Kajii starts from a shocking sentence. We made a short Visual Novel based on this story with Illustrator Kotori's watercolor works, beautiful photographs, and imposing musics.

name: ãƒŸã‚¬ã‚«ãƒŸã‚«ã‚¬ãƒŸ -reviver-
desc: MIGAKAMIKAGAMI -reviver- is a Horror 2D Pixel art Adventure Escape game. The story is set in a rural hospital where a legend of divine abductions by a deity called "Migakami-sama" has been passed down. The protagonists, Mika and Nae, are caught up in the divine abduction.

name: Little Robot
desc: Join me on my first game as an Indie Dev with this casual 15-minute exploration game where players navigate the backyard, as our favorite sad robot, collecting essential components to successfully return indoors!

name: Hold Me Still
desc: "Hold Me Still" is a point-and-click puzzle mystery game where you investigate your friend's disappearance by exploring their house, collecting clues, solving puzzles, and uncovering the truth.

notes: Same as name of the game
name: Dependency Psychological Test
desc: A narrative-driven point-and-click game that explores dependent personality through interactive psychological testing. Make choices, build relationships, and discover how your behavior shapes your mental assessment.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd
desc: Honkai Impact 3rd - Ultimate anime action made real! HD cel-shading, infinite combos, explosive feedback... Experience next-gen real-time action! An original tale told across media, immersive stage events, star-studded voice cast... Become part of the legend!

name: Dilemma: The Game
desc: In this 2D, Point and Click, choose-your-own-adventure experience. You will pick a way to respond to dilemmas .Answer non-sensical thought questions and unearth what happens from your choices.

name: Biophobia
desc: A woman is violated by a man. In a final act of rebellion to preserve her humanity, she takes control and opens her stomach. Unable to finish what she started she waits for you, and asks you not to look away.

name: Replicomica
desc: A short, atmospheric experience set inside a handcrafted dream. You are a small, solitary citizen drifting through augmented memories. Boot up your LonelyOS and let the robots guide you.

name: Terminus
desc: Paris, 1968. As the city sinks into social unrest, a far darker threat rises from deep underground. Charles Mercier, a former SOLDIER recruited by a secret organization, is sent into the METRO tunnels to prevent an IMMINENT CATASTROPHE.

name: Project:M
desc: Indie Horror puzzle game

name: The Falling Star
desc: The Falling Star is a first-person exploration and narrative-driven walking simulator. Following the mother's last wish, the girl embarks on a journey in a dream to uncover the story of her missing auntâ€™s past.

name: Hollowing
desc: Play as a student who is alone outside. He is constantly under academic and social pressure. As anxiety and loneliness accumulated, he began to notice something unusual. In this inescapable fear, he must find the answer... or be consumed by it.

name: Voice of the Ocean
desc: Voice of the Ocean is a single-player adventure about a lost world, and the echoes of a forgotten past. Use your voice to sing ancient melodies and explore a world lost beneath the waves. Dive into the depths to uncover the power within your song and learn why you may be the last of your kind.

name: The River
desc: A short story point-and-click visual novel about the afterlife.

name: Infinite Blue
desc: Discover an immersive ocean Eco-Sim where you can be almost any animal under the sea! From a tiny seahorse to a massive blue whale, experience the endless circle of life in a massive world of reefs, shipwrecks, and hidden wonders.

name: Shelter from the Storm
desc: Rain lashes down soaking you to the bone, you take shelter in a seemingly abandoned house. Navigate through the rooms solving puzzles and trying to escape in this short point & click adventure game.

name: Contraindication
desc: Your end is my beginning. A short psychological visual novel with exploration and puzzle elements... it already lays shattered.

name: This is the last time
desc: This is the Last Time is a minimalist first-person narrative game with a dark and heavy atmosphere.

name: Greed's Grub
desc: You donâ€™t remember exactly what you did, just that it had to have been real bad, if this was your punishment. Five days of community service in this greasy, rotting excuse for a burger joint. Just five days, and youâ€™re free. Thatâ€™s all you have to endure.

notes: loop in the hall with penguin
name: PEXIT 8
desc: Penguin Ã— Exit 8 : A unique combination Escape from the endlessly looping hallway. If you find an anomaly, choose YES PEN. If there is no anomaly, choose NO PEN. All anomalies contain penguin elements. Penguins are after you.

name: Banshee
desc: The game is about escaping from a house where â€œBansheeâ€, a frightening looking fairy, wanders around, exploring the surroundings and using the items found to escape.

name: Half-Life 2 RTX
desc: Re-live the groundbreaking, critically acclaimed Half-Life 2 like never before, reimagined with RTX Remix. Featuring full ray tracing, remastered assets, and DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation, this DLC is free for Half-Life 2 owners.

name: TRIBE NINE
desc: Defy the madness. Brutal Action RPG "TRIBE NINE" Set in the nation of Neo Tokyo, where absolute madness rules. Here, teens face life-or-death battles, constantly resisting the harsh and unjust worldâ€”all in pursuit of reclaiming their lost freedom and dreams.

name: Black Reliquary
desc: Black Reliquary is a challenging overhaul mod for Darkest Dungeon, one which makes sweeping changes to gameplay, adds a new story, a new setting, new narration, new music, new enemies, and so very much more. Embark into the distant east and uncover the ancient secrets of the Black Reliquary!

name: Poppy Playtime
desc: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught.

name: ReDo
desc: A supernatural horror visual novel game where your choices decide if you and your friends see the light of day again or not. Use your sleuthing skills with point and click mechanics to battle horrifying creatures of the night that haunt an abandoned school building and earn your title of "Exorcist"!

notes: My First video on my YouTube Channel :)
name: PockeDate! - Pocket Dating Simulator
desc: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

name: Kagura Survivors: Endless Night
desc: Something is wrong in the Kaguraverse. An anomaly is creating tears in space-time and causing parallel worlds to converge! It falls upon Kagura-chan, the vessel of the Goddess's will, to get to the bottom of this crisis and return order to the various universes.

name: World of Warships
desc: Immerse yourself in thrilling naval battles and assemble an armada of over 600 ships from the first half of the 20th century â€” from stealthy destroyers to gigantic battleships. Change the look of your ship, choose upgrades to suit your play style, and go into battle with other players!

name: Warframe
desc: Awaken as an unstoppable warrior and battle alongside your friends in this story-driven free-to-play online action game

name: War Thunder
desc: War Thunder is the most comprehensive free-to-play, cross-platform, MMO military game dedicated to aviation, armoured vehicles, and naval craft, from the early 20th century to the most advanced modern combat units. Join now and take part in major battles on land, in the air, and at sea.

name: Apex Legendsâ„¢
desc: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Hero Shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities, and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Hero Shooter and Battle Royale.

name: Marvel Rivals
desc: Marvel Rivals is a Super Hero Team-Based PVP Shooter! Assemble an all-star Marvel squad, devise countless strategies by combining powers to form unique Team-Up skills and fight in destructible, ever-changing battlefields across the continually evolving Marvel universe!

name: LoveCraft
desc: Welcome to LoveCraft - home to interesting people, hot parties, exploration and fulfilling relationships! Create your world, from a unique persona to your exciting adventures.

name: MY HERO ULTRA RUMBLE
desc: Pick your favorite character, team up and fight to be the last ones standing in the new 24-player Battle Royale free to play game "MY HERO ULTRA RUMBLE"!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Rebound
desc: 3on3 FreeStyle: Rebound allows players to work with their teammates to pull off rim-shaking slam dunks, awe-inspiring alley-oops, flashy no-look passes, and clutch outside shots which breaks the heart of the opposing team in competitive games filled with the joy and energy of street basketball.

name: Crush Crush
desc: Welcome to Crush Crush - the Idle Dating Sim! Meet, flirt, and fall in love with a motley cast of girls in this heartfelt and hilarious game.

name: Drawful 2
desc: For 3-8 players and an audience of thousands! Your phones or tablets are your controllers! The game of terrible drawings and hilariously wrong answers.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club!
desc: The Literature Club is full of cute girls! Will you write the way into their heart? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Conspiracy Girls
desc: Conspiracy Girls is a short visual novel about cute and funny girls who around exposing conspiracies, and get into all sorts of trouble doing so!

name: SEXTS
desc: Let's start typing!Discover gorgeous hentai women in this typing game!Play and unlock tons of pics of the most sublime waifus!!!

notes: Test your mouse with banana on the screen.
name: Banana
desc: Banana is a clicker Game, in which you click a Banana! In Banana you click the Banana to gain even more Bananas! Every 3 hours, you get dropped a banana. Each banana is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Kokurase Episode 1
desc: The Kokurase gang, also known as Cupidâ€™s Helpers, is out to help freshman Sakura woo Yoshimitsu, a popular senior with every other girl in school vying for his heart. Switch between members to bring these two lovebirds together in an intertwining tale.

name: First Snow
desc: Having moved away from her friends and family to attend community college, Allison Merlo is a fresh student struggling with the day to day challenges of life.

name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters
desc: The free version of the final word in fighting entertainment - DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round!
developer: Team NINJA, KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.

name: Cave Crawler
desc: Cave Crawler is a short, 2D side-scrolling action platformer. Explore caves filled with interesting enemies and fun platforming challenges.

name: Narcissu 1st & 2nd
desc: This is a story of disease and suffering; of medication and adverse effects; of thoracotomy scars and cellular poisons; of the living who cannot help but to die and of the dying who cannot help but to live; of a resting place other than "on 7F" or "at home".

name: Beat of Rebellion
desc: Be the voice out of the choir! Beat of Rebellion is an isometric rhythm-based Hack & Slash. Follow the Beat, create your own Melodies and unleash devastating combos to fight against a totalitarian regime in a cyberpunk city.

name: Operation: Outbreak
desc: Your squad's vehicle exploded during a patrol, and you're the only survivor. The enemy is unusual this time. A virus has turned the city into a warzone of the undead. Get to the exfil in time or die trying. A free-to-play short and intense FPS zombie survival horror game.

name: Modularity
desc: Modularity is a resource management builder game where the player stitches together flesh and metal in creative ways to construct bigger and greater amalgamations.
developer: William Skou Heidemann - Tech Lead, Tim Meincke Bramming - Programmer, Jakob Ehlers - Programmer, Christina Desypri - Lead Game Designer, Lykke Legendre Dahl - UX Designer, Nicholas Demetroulakos - Producer

name: Stories Adrift: Wake - Prologue
desc: As the new owner of a book boat, you are entrusted with returning a single page of a book and embarks on a journey through a world both mysterious and familiar. By solving intricate puzzles and piecing together scattered clues, you uncover the truth of the world - and of yourself.

name: Path of the Tank
desc: Can you challenge oblivion itself?

name: Lokko
desc: Lokko is a bouncy, action-packed 3D platformer where YOU create the adventure! In Lokko, players race to deliver hot pizzas around the globe while battling the sinister Goobol fast-food corporation.
